title: Covid Symptoms Can Rebound Even If You Don’t Take Paxlovid
description: A new study found that more than a third of those who recovered from an infection had symptoms recur days or weeks later.
dc:creator: Knvul Sheikh
category: Journal of the American Medical Assn
media:description: Rebound symptoms are common, said one doctor. “It doesn’t mean that things are going south,” he said. “It’s just the natural way the disease goes.”
